notes: feminine noun, can mean exit or outing

example_sentence_english: The exits are at the back.
I passed through the side exit.
There was smoke in the exit.
I read a note about the exit.

notes: no contraction for con + la; written as 'con l''
example_sentence_italian: Abbiamo misurato il flusso con l'uscita principale aperta.
example_sentence_english: We measured the flow with the main exit open.
There are signs at the exits.
There are problems in the exits.
I found information about the exits.

example_sentence_italian: Con le uscite chiuse, la sicurezza aumenta.
example_sentence_english: With the exits closed, security increases.
